documentation.title: Subject
documentation.description: The subject of your email. See character length requirements according to RFC 2822.

documentation.title: Message Identifier
documentation.description: The identifier is provider-specific and not unique.

documentation.title: Title
documentation.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

documentation.title: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

value.value: Hello Jane, your recent order on Our Shop has been shipped.
Hello Jane, we shipped your recent order on Our Shop. You can track it here.
Hello Jane, your recent order on Our Shop has been shipped.
An email address must contain a single @

documentation.title: Send Email
documentation.description:
Send transactional email to one recipient.
Email can contain text and/or html representation.

documentation.title: Content
documentation.description: The Base64 encoded content of the attachment.

documentation.title: Type
documentation.description: The MIME type of the content you are attaching (e.g., “text/plain” or “text/html”).
